content.detailedDescription: I was driving east to work at 11:45am.  i noticed a strange looking cloud which looked like a ufo cloud.  i grabbed my camera and took a few photos.  the clouds above looked normal except for this one.  it stayed in place with no movement.  i did not know what to make of it since it could have been a real cloud.  i did notice later that the city was covered with chemtrails.
content.summary: Cloud resembles ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
1. watching luner eclpise 12-21-2010
2. the falling lights
3. we tried to determine what it was and came to the conclution that is was nothing man made
4. the amber lights looked like they were placed in a circle with a red one in the middle and a white on on top you could make out each light because of the small sace in between them but the white light had a little more space inbetween it then the rest, i assume thats because it was on top of the craft
5. my fellings and reactions were wtf was that? then a sudden feeling of insignificance knowing that i just saw a ufo
6. it fell between the tree line


(my personal detailed discription)
  i was outside with my best friend watching the luner eclipse and we both saw four amber lights across from eachother with a redlight in the center and a white light on top.
this object came into view above the moon and decended to earth in under 10 seconds it fell behind the tree line near my house. it looked like where it fell was about 100 miles away from where we were. we never say anything come back up above the tree line after that.. no satilite could have steady lights like that and would burn up in the atmosephere, no plane could have done a dive from that high, it was not a space shuttle, and it was not a meteor.
content.summary: Bright distinct amber/yellow and white lights falling at a rapid speed

content.detailedDescription:
While waiting for the beginnig of the lunar eclipse, my 16 year old son spotted a single reddish/orange cone shape object traveling from the north to south across the sky. altitude was not discernable, there was no sound emanating from the object. it took approximately 2.5 - 3 minutes for the object to travel across the sky at a constant velocity. my son said that the object just appeared as he was looking at the moon. we had binoculars to observe the eclipse, and on closer inspection with the binoculars my son described the object as a firey reddish orange badmitton birdy, i.E. cone shaped. in addition to myself observing it with my son, my 20 year old daughter also observed the object. after the object was out of sight, my daughter and i returned to the house, but my son remained outside expecting to see another object. within 3-4 minutes my son was yelling inside the house that another object was in sight - this time my daughter, my wife, and myself were outside observing the object. this one was following the same trajectory; however, it's track was approximately 10 degrees more easterly in the sky. as this second object started to disappear in the southern sky, two more objects appeared in the northern sky. one of them followed approximately the same track as the first object, and the other one followed the track of the second object - i.E. their east/west position in the sky as they both travelled north to south. 

none of the objects produced any discernable noise. they did not have any strobes, nor did we see any kind of rotating beacon, or green starboard light on the object.  we've lived on the space coast for nearly 18 years and have seen scores of space shuttle and rocket launches from kennedy space center and canaveral air force base. the color and intensity of the objects were similar to that of a rocket plume, but did not have any corresponding noise/vibration, nor did it appear to travel with the velocity neccessary to achieve orbit. the speed was constant, not accelerated. 

i am an instrument rated private pilot with hundreds of hours of flying time. i also have a bachelors degree in physics and in aerospace engineering. i am 50 years old and have never seen anything like these objects in the sky.

a video clip from my son's iphone was taken, but not does share anything besides our comments for a brief period and a dot of light.
content.summary: 4 reddish/orange cone shape lights traveling north to south

content.detailedDescription: I saw two of the objects at a 45 degree angle, i was at the parking lot by the band hall and high school gym when i saw two objects toward the west of goldthwaite. they had six lights on them each, and the lights on both of them were bright white lights. this happened between 6:00-6:30. i was at the high school gym. i was standing on the sidewalk when my friend yelled "what is that?!" my first thoughts was that it was a helicopter or airplane. the objects sat there and did not move. then after a few seconds, they disappeared. i felt a little confused and shaky during and after the sighting. i lost sight when the object's lights went off
content.summary: 2 objects, six lights on them both

content.detailedDescription:
Awoke to soft yellow and orange changing light coming from object in corner of bedroom approx 5ft tall graduating in size from approx four ft round ring to 3ft ring to 2ft ring to 1 ft ring. small ring at top to large ring at bottom. rings rotating in alternate directions.Heard a high pitched repeating sound but it seemed to be coming from outside not from the object. i kept opening and closing my eyes to be sure i was seeing what was there was real. after about 10 min. i pulled the covers over my head and continued to pray for it to leave. then the sound started to fade and the room got cold and when i pulled the covers back down it was gone and the air in my room was like pure oxygen. i know what pure oxygen is like having been on oxygen when hospitalized several times. i also know what the air in my room is usually like. this was totally different.
my husband was aslepp in the living room that night and i told him about this first thing in the morning. then on sat. we read about the sighting that was reported in the paper that happened earlier that day and evening.
content.summary: Object giving off light and sound in bedroom-changed quality of air in room

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work and noticed a bright cloud as i got on the on ramp to the freeway so i took 3 pictures once on the freeway i no longer could see the bright cloud once i got to work i was excited it was still there and took 3 more photos as it disapated when i reviewed the photos i noticed that there are orbs in the last 3 shots.
content.summary: Unusual cloud

content.detailedDescription: There were 30 - 40 people standing at the corner of 23rd and 8th in chelsea, nyc on october 13, 2010 looking up and pointing ( they were saying they see a ufo), and news trucks from abc news 7 and ny1 were there also. the object was very big and it was high up, at least 10,000 feet and stationary. it faded in and out a few times. i was unable to get it on my video camera, so i stood around a bit then started to walk north on 8th. as i was walking i looked up ( north east ) and noticed what look like an orb shining bright blue, it disappeared and reappeared a few times. the object was flying very fast up and down side to side and circling around, it stopped once and hovered for around 3-5 seconds then took off at a hi rate of speed, it made no sound. as the orb dimmed i noticed it looked like a disc. the disc had 2 cylider shaped objects on each side, when it would move the cylinders looked like they were rotating in the direction it was going. the video was slowed down because the object was moving fast.
content.summary: There were 30 - 40 people standing at the corner of 23rd and 8th in chelsea, nyc on october 13, 2010 looking up and pointing ( they were saying they see a ufo)

content.detailedDescription: At first i thought it was an airplane because we live close to an airport. 12:40pm , we were driving home from the shopping center when i noticed a very shiny aluminum looking in color object which seemed to be an airplane taking off from the airport , it was about 200yards in front of us and about 300ft in the air. i was watching it when it seemed to turn in the other direction it was heading west and looked like it turned to the south when i thought i was looking at the back of it i could see a tiny star like light and then it just disappeared. it was a clear day and my wife was with me but i didn't tell her about it when i saw it because i thought it was just an airplane. anyways im sure it wasn't an airplane, because they dont just disappear.
content.summary: Shiny

content.detailedDescription:
While at my home watching television in my living room a blue-white light came into view through the the upper portion of my living room window.The glow of this object illuminated the area of floor below the window and drew my attention then to the top of the window as the object came into view shortly thereafter.
 the object appeared to be the size of a penny held at arms length.

the object did not produce any sound that i am aware of.

this object was traveling at a high rate of speed. many many times faster than any conventional aircraft.

 i quickly raced to my window, parted the lower window shades ( the lower window is the only portion of this window with shades) and again observed this object. it was aprox. two to three miles away at this point. it was climbing in an arc toward the northeast. 

this object did not display any f.A.A. required lighting configurations.

 the light intensity did not waver during the sighting. it did not blink, flutter or fade. the object intensity remained constant from all angles during my observation.The object was in my estimation 300 to 500 ft distant at it's nearest point to me.
 
 i checked "flight aware" and found no aircraft to be in the area.
content.summary: Fast moving bright blue-white object traveling northeasterly

content.detailedDescription: I turned left off of auction road went thru the covered bridge, turned right and saw an object in the sky. i thought at first a plane... looked a little harder and thought hhmmmm don't remember a cell tower being out here. got to a stop sign right by the spooky nook golfplex and i sat there staring in the sky at the lights wondering what it was because they were to bright to be a cell tower's lights. sat there for a minute or two then the object began moving in my direction. slowly too like 5 mph couldn't of been much faster than that at about 200 yards up or so (about the height of a cell tower) as it got closer i took out my cell phone but it's a piece of junk so i couldn't record anything i cracked the window to see if i could hear anything but there was no sound zero noise and this was a large object, to wide to be an airplane. there were 4 large bright white lights and two blinking lights one blue the other red. it continued to move very slowly and silently across the sky and as it approached the highway it sped up effortlessly to around 50 mph or so. i just sat there shaking my head trying to figure out what in the hell that could of been! all i know is no known man-made aircraft can move that slowly and with no sound across the sky. very very bizarre and i wish there was an answer for what that thing was other than u.F.O. i've never seen anything like that and i wasn't on drugs, drunk or hallucinating at the time either!! i was relieved to hear that other sightings had occurred earlier that day but i haven't seen anything about lights at night.
content.summary: Strange lights, object moving very slowly and silently across sky

content.detailedDescription:
At about 7:18pm (cst) i observed a bright orange orb which seemed to be heading southeast for 3 minutes then remained stationary near maywood, il for about another 2 minutes, continued to keep track of the orb until it dissapered. was able to capture the moon and a plane flying near by to compare with the initial orb.

the orb was the brightest object in the sky at the moment, brighter than the moon.
content.summary: Orange orb

content.detailedDescription: A few weeks ago i reported a ufos that flew over my home at very low altitdue, well yesterday im sitting at home and the entire house started shaking from 2 black unmarked choppers, one was stationary over my home only as the other flew in a very tight circle over my home only. they stayed there for about 5 minutes then flew off. dont know what kind they where but they were to big not to be military. all black no markings at all, they were low enough to see 2 guys in the back not counting pilots. these things were huge and very very low and stayed directly over my home. looked through binoculers and was able to litteraly see inside....Just kinda odd to have it happen after my sighting of 3 very low ufos.
content.summary: Black unmarked helicoptors

content.detailedDescription:
Well we were layin in our park me and tree more friends of myself and sudenly one of them say look up theres a ufo i quikly turn up my sight and see the blimp moving like no human airplane or helicopter like doing zigzags constantly for about 2 minutes then it disapear.

i take a pic with my cell phone but its a vga cam so i dont get the blimp in my pic dam it looks as bright as a planet but moving all arround
content.summary: Night in the park

content.detailedDescription: We were standing in our front yard in oklahoma city when we witnessed around 10 disc-shaped objects with a bright orange light on the front of them. they were very fast and made no noise what so ever. they flew from the south side of the sky directly to the north. after they were gone, several more flew bye and then nothing for awhile, then one more flew by. we sat outside for awhile but nothing else has happened and i was curious if anyone else in oklahoma city saw this.
content.summary: Saw fireball like disc

content.detailedDescription:
There are actually two events which happened on this date. first, my husband saw a silver flash, much like an elongated straight line over a tree line to the east. this occurred at approximately 2:15 pm, while we were heading south on state rd. 101. the second was even more perplexing. we were headed north on 101 and spotted a stationary glowing object, which we thought may have been over the richmond area. both of us thought perhaps it was an airevac going into reid hospital, but we are 30 miles from there and would not have seen something like that due to obstructions. as we made a left onto dunlapsville rd, enroute to connersville, the "light" glowed a bluish white and seemed to have followed us. it was cloudy and snowing lightly, so doubtfully it was an aircraft. it was on a straight trajectory and when it was at my 5 o'clock position of the car, it glowed brighter and then was gone.
     insofar as the first incident is concerned, my husband also saw that bluish-white streak before and i, too, have seen it once or twice. they are pointed at each end and a little thicker in the middle. he has also seen a blackish type of "thing" over the treeline which would be toward the east and near oxford, oh. neither of us could explain what the glowing light was, either, as it was too cloudy to see venus or jupiter. having a degree in earth and space science, admittedly, i could not comprehend what it was we saw. regarding our feelings, it was a real headscratcher.
content.summary: Looked like aircraft anticollision light, but bluish

content.detailedDescription: I was walking across a courtyard on the indiana university campus with a friend and glanced up for no reason--it was cloudy out. i saw this orb-shaped object moving at a good 20-30mph across the sky.  it appeared to have one light on the front (similar to an eyeball). the white was a white or beige color, but the craft itself glowed dimly a pinkish orange color.  it moved in a very direct, straight path below the clouds, but higher than the treetops.  i would estimate it to be about the size of a regular suv.  i would never consider myself a ufo person, not even with an "open mind".  but this ufo startled me and my friend and i followed it, running, for a couple yards trying to figure out whether or not it was a ufo.  there was no way it could be a balloon--because of the front beam/light it had.  it finally went out of sight over trees and into the far distance.  we were able to watch it for about 2-3 minutes.  it never occurred to me to report it until i was trying to tell my mother, who asked me to look it up, but no other sightings were reported, unfortunately.
content.summary: Orb/sphere shaped ufo over bloomginton

content.detailedDescription: These are the best pictures i have ever captured of the wired ny web cam site...Just look and you wont believe them... in one picture look on the far upper right side you will see an actual air ship...Ufo im happy i captured these images...All the best ~mark
content.shape: Cone,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Better evidence of ufo's over nyc again !!!!

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo: black triangle, over san francisco, captured on video tape.
date: 12/15/2010 wed night. 
time: 22:00 pst. 
location: outer sunset district of san francisco, ca. 

my ir camera was pointing 17 degrees east (magnetic north for san francisco) and it was pointing up from the horizon about 60 degrees. this black triangle was not as close as my nov 2008 sighting that flew over my house. this ufo was father away (maybe 3000 feet high or so), but my 3 times power ir night video camera was able to bring it in closer. this triangle had two round shape bright white lights constantly on. these lights were located at the ufos far end section, but the strangest thing was that it seemed to be flying on its side or sideways. i did not see any other lights turned on nor blinking, if it made a noise, i could not hear it radiating. it seemed quiet to me. i was able to record a few seconds of it as it past the cameras lens. i was not able to follow the ufo with the camera, because other houses blocked my view of it. i will try to capture more ufos next week, after the rain stops. mufon, if you are interested in my ufo sightings over san francisco from march, 2010 until now, please look at my you tube   ufoandusohunter  
thank you
content.summary: Black ufo triangle over san frsancisco 10 pm dec.15 (wed) 2010

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my barn in the back yard feeding the horses for the evening. the barn cats started acting weird, making sounds i have not heard from them before and puffing up. i went out of the barn to investigate if there was an animal causing their distress but i saw nothing.
i fed the horse then started walking back to the house. the night was foggy and the sky was partially cloudy.
i saw 3 orbs of white light in the sky in front of the barn. they were flying in individual circles where they would meet in the middle and fly out again. at first i thought it was search lights but they were moving too differently from the searchlight pattern, they were moving in different areas of the sky.
the circling orbs of light moved from the sky over the barn up towards the house.
it reminded me of vultures circling.
i watched them for approximately 10 minutes. then it went to 2 orbs of light then they vanished.
they were visible in the cloud cover better than the night sky.
i got my husband and he grabbed the camera. we were not able to get a photo but we got a short video on the camera.
when i was watching the orbs, i wondered if they were angels. i did not think i would feel so apprehensive watching angels because i was afraid as i was watching. i was also fascinated and drawn to watching them, i did not stop watching until they vanished.
i am curious to know if any one else in this area was outside and saw what i saw.
content.summary: 3 orbs of light circling in the night sky, then 2 orbs of light then they disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Case number 27032, 2 witnesses live flyover on site, flyover zone 40 degree 39 feet 53.86 inches north and 74 degrees 14 feet 02.45 inches west same time. *email address moved to additional evidence section -- cms/sg.
content.summary: Case number 27032

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i just got done making love,sorry, but that's the truth,and i went down to the basement to throw clothes in dryer, and my wife started screaming. *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) come up here.She was laying in bed,face in the window,she said it just came down,no noise,and hovered above the next door neighbors house.She said she could see lights underneath the ship,changing colors,but making no noise whatsoever.I have been with my wife for more than twenty years,have never known her to lie about anything,so i beleive her.To stress my point,i was skeptical at first,but i put two and two together.The dog was going crazy outside barking,when i looked,i didn't see anything,my wife said it just went straight up,no noise,nothing.When i got up the next morning,and looked outside,there was a brown circle ring across the backyard grass,big too.I should have called someone,and i regret it now.Wouldn't that leave radiation levels or something?It is good to find somewhere to get this off my chest,over the years since, i have been hearing reports of sightings near nuclear plants,we were'nt too far from perry nuclear power plant.
content.summary: Came down outside of window,wife flipped out,but she saw underneath saucer

content.detailedDescription: I was walking east up steiner st. crossing page st. at about 11:58. when i noticed a light in the sky to my left. it was cloudy and drizzling outside so the light stood out since there were no planes or stars visible. i thought it was a helicopter at first, but there were no blinking lights or sound. i stopped to observe it. it moved from east to west, then appeared to head towards me. it stopped in the sky. it was stationary for about one to two minutes. the light was an orange glowing somewhat spherical ball in the sky. after watching it for about two minutes, it appeared to ascend up into the clouds and disappeared. it was pretty eerie and gave me chills when it stopped and just hovered. after it disappeared, i just headed home and called it a night.
content.summary: Saw a slow moving orange sphere like fireball in the sky under the cloud line in san francisco

content.detailedDescription:
I am a pilot, college educated and i have seen many objects that are unknown and either very secret military or from way out of this world. i believe, and am not a skeptic whatsoever. but now to see this picture on the home page of the december 17, 2010 mufon site really made me have to comment. at the end of this sighting report of dec.12th,2010 of a picture near the washington monument, notice the poster left a little hint that this was a possible hoax!! he or she ends it with a smiley face punctuation mark. if i am wrong, i apologize, but some seagulls do have black on their head, and with a very hd monitor i can see some large  "pixelation"blocks that, to me, show a little photo-shop work. i believe that we all want honest postings here.To gain and share knowledge. to me, this is not one of them. the end of this report i will paste unedited. just google seagull pictures and not much imagination will be needed. let's keep the truth alive. filer's file has the date wrong also as dec.7th,2010,(#51-2010). all you good folks be the judge. thanks and look at the picture again. i do not want to waste your time but it's worth another look. mufon should also. investigate. real and unexplainable things have been dismissed by mufon.Keep looking up.They are there and i and many have seen and know..Thank you..This vermonter believes.The report end as and i quote,,,,,,".Anyhow i would love to know what you think this is, even if it is a secret military plane or something, its just interesting me :) end quote.
what you good folks think.Look at the picture also, carefully!!! use the search database to view.
content.summary: Belief of a past posted hoax! please read. i believe.

content.detailedDescription:
While at the beatswap meet in china town it was between 4:00pm and 4:15, my wife pointed out something that looked like  stars in the sky by the moon. i have never seen anything this close this birght, as the objects formed a triangle pattern and a sort of orion's belt i counted 16 objects.Planes flew in between the objects so it looked,( i later realized the objects where very far away even though they looked close) the objects started moving in formation  to the north and then disappeared. this event lasted about 5 min.  i managed to take  a few shots off the camera and the brightest object looked very interesting. i enlarged it and it looks very interesting,i dont know what im seeing 
this picture was taken at 18 megs and is 5000 pixels so it was easy to blow it up.
this picture only shows five objects, i was shooting at the brightest one of the bunch.

side note:
i had my camera , taking pictures all day long it was working fine, when i pointed it at the object it just would not work for some reason, as well as i could not see it on my viewing screen ,like it was invisible, i was very frustrated(it could have been operator error who knows) all i know is that if i pointed at the objects it would not take a picture, when pointing at something else it took a picture fine.
when i got home to download the pictures to my hard drive and as it was transferring it suddenly unmounted it self and gave me an error message saying it was not there anymore. after getting a recovery program and painfully retrieving some of the files, all files worked , except the one with the video of the objects. i have never had so much trouble getting a picture. tell me what this is.
content.summary: Very bright very slow

content.detailedDescription: This was the quick ufo i filmed, but i slowed it down to show that its a silver "tophat" shaped craft...Moving very quickly and stealthy at night.
content.summary: Silver ufo

content.detailedDescription: The airspace over nyc as we all know since 911 is very very restricted!!! lately i heard that the wired ny webcam site has spotted strange lights,ufo's,etc...??? so i decided to watch them, well they didn't let me down. almost immediately i saw strange objects,lights,spears,glowing in the sky over either brooklyn,nj or the hudson river in nyc/nj. im am not positive which way these webcams are pointing, so i cant say for sure? but here are some pictures i took off of these cams in particular cams 3 & 4..They seem to catch most of thee action!!! it is pretty strange..They will sometimes stay in one place for a minute or to,other times they appear & zip off quickly...Let me know what you think...Thanks!!!
content.shape: Cylinder,   Disc,   Flash,   Square,   Rectagular,   Other
content.summary: Ufo's on webcams over nyc/brooklyn/nj ???

content.detailedDescription:
It was a very sunny day in newport ri at approximately 12:15pm.  the sun was bright over the water and i thought it would make a nice picture.  i did not notice anything at the time i was taking the picture.  there were no sounds such as a helicoptor or aircraft.  later while looking at the picture on my computer i noticed an unusual object in the sky on the upper right side of the photo.  i could not determine any explanation for this object.  i thought that perhaps it was something on the camera lense so i took another picture and the object did not show up in the new picture. 

photo 1 which i am attaching is the first photo with the unusual object.  photo 2 is later in the day when i decided to make sure it was not the lense of the camera.

i have looked at this several times and have showed it to others and no one seems to have an explanation of what this object might be.  maybe you can.  i would like to know what it is that i captured in this photo.  this has me very puzzled.
content.summary: I noticed a unknown object in a picture that i took of the harbor in newport ri on 12/17/2010.

content.detailedDescription: Very quick ufo snuck up on me while i was out skywatching, it was totally silent and very quick.  i attached a video to show the shape and speed of the craft.  it caught me off guard and i was only able to get a few seconds of it before it vanished.
content.summary: Very quick ufo snuck up on me while i was out skywatching,

content.detailedDescription: On the morning of november 23, 2010 i stepped out on my porch to admire the new fallen snow.  i noticed that the sky had cleared and the snow had stopped falling.  it had been snowing since 5:00 am the previous day.  so i then started to stare at the sky.  from the north came gliding by two orange or amber circular lights next to each other.  it was at a low elevation and did not make any noise at all!  it flew by at a very high speed and the sighting only lasted a few seconds.  as it was headed south, my guess was that it was doing the same thing i was doing that morning, admiring the new fallen snow.  i observe lots of aircraft fly by house.  when they do they are usually at a higher elevation and either the aircraft's lights or noise allow me to quickly determine human-made airplanes.  this was definitely the strangest aircraft i have ever seen.  probably the strangest part about it was the absence of noise.  the size of the two lights and the brilliant amber color of them would be the second strange part about my sighting.  i was completely lucid during the sighting.
content.summary: Two amber lights inside a disc passed by my house.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home down thatcher street in brockton, ma after one of my night classes massasoit community college. it was close to 10 o'clock and very dark out and cold. the street lights were not really working and somewhat dim every block or two there would be light. and when i decided to look up at a tree which i often do to stare at the sky or tree's. i ended up seeing some big round object above a house. it was probably 20 feet or so above the house. i am horrible with estimation of how up high it was. but it was double the size of a 3 story house maybe triple. it was hovering above the house for a while with some noise that you couldn't really hear. at first i thought it was an airplane since there was three glowing lights under it that formed a triangle. but then why would it hover above a house and then after thinking about it. i started to walk faster to avoid it since i was a little scared yet i was fascinated since i do believe in aliens and visitors from another planet. it moved a little to the right and circled the area a little probably one full circle around 4 or 5 houses away and then it came back to the same house then went right towards east side shaw's direction as it ascends higher into the air before disappearing from my sight. i could only see a pitch black object in the sky with the three lights under it. i have thought about posting it earlier but when i arrived home i told a friend and family member about it and they told me that it was probably just an helicopter or airplane. i just let it go even though i do think about it occasionally until someone told me about mufon. there is not enough proof what i saw was a ufo or an helicopter or airplane. but what i do know is that a helicopter would make more noise and an airplane would not stop in a random spot for so long since they have a destination to arrive at. therefore what i saw was something that is unexplainable and remain in my memories.
content.summary: Big dark circle object with three lights forming a triangle
